title: I reckon Brand Support should be tweaked.
body:
I honestly can't play ADC when the enemy team picks Brand support. There's nothing I can do in lane, he literally does 90% of the damage then the ADC just picks me off without even trying. I can't even farm because if I go close he'll just W me doing 1/3 of my health in one hit at level 2.

How the fuck do I play against this? It's honestly hell it makes me wanna not play a role that I enjoy playing to a role I'm not good at so I don't have to lane with that piece of shit Brand support.

replies.body: You play in behind minion waves, and you sidestep the w. Once its down you have so much time to punish him for missing. If your letting him hit you with every w then your play is wrong not brand.
That's what I'm doing but I'm missing farm as a result.
If only I could get Hexdrinker 2 minutes into the game.
Start building {{item:3155}} . costs as much as {{item:1038}}

The exact moment I saw Likkrit bring out the Brand support at IWCQ I decided to spam him in Ranked for a couple days. The biggest problem I faced during that time was that getting cc'ed or hit by a well timed gank (or both) meant I was usually dead, especially when I had just used/missed my abilities.  

Considering that Brand's playstyle is so aggressive, that period of vulnerability is quite often. Similarly, there is a decent chance that Brand will continue to play aggressively in an attempt to get back into the game despite being in a losing lane or having used summoner spells, a point at which your lead can be furthered.

Admittedly, the solution I'm suggesting is to work together. I realise that isn't always going to be easy when many Brand supports are able to outplay multiple opponents at the same time. On the flipside, I find that very same confidence usually puts them in a position where a bit of synergy can wipe the grin off their face.
They should change it so if he does ew his secondary effect is consumed, so he cant stun then still do the 150% or whatever w damage
